> **Why should you choose GetKVM?**

Because we provide quality KVM VPS hosting on fully redundant networks with prompt support during our UK business hours.
<ul>
<li>Full hardware virtualization in 2 locations with zero overselling.</li>
<li>UK Based support with 15 minute responses during business hours.</li>
<li>Multihomed low latency networks with a multi-router configuration.</li>
<li>Multiple gigabits of internet connectivity from premium upstream carriers.</li>
<li>A service that's trusted and favoured by hundreds of customers worldwide.</li>
<li>RAID10 storage arrays with BBU for data protection and improved throughput.</li>
<li>BGP4, VRRP and meshing utilization to ensure fully redundant network availability.</li>
</ul>

> **Network Information**

> **Included Features**

Start, stop and reboot your VPS
Automated OS reinstalls via template or ISO
Historical and current resource usage graphs
KVM Over VNC console with pre-boot (BIOS) level management
**FREE** service monitoring with email notifications (RRP £1.50/pcm)
Full support for custom virtual media (Provide us an ISO and we can mount it for you)
